oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mother with deer and children
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Mrs. Burton, in floral patterned dress, with sons Dan Ray and Joe Mack, and their pet deer "Bucky" walk up a hill towards W.C. Burton's home on Route 1, Lake City, Tennessee. One boy is holding hands with his mother. The building is made of wood.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Captive wild animals; Captive mammals; Wild animals as pets; Pets; White-tailed deer as pets; Mother and child; Photography of families; Dresses; Wooden-frame houses
Deer; Houses; Trails & paths; Walking; Families
